overview: A short film that consists only of one character, the film has no dialogue, it tackles homosexuality in the Arab world through the Loneliness of the monotonous everyday life of a gay man, yet it is both complex and unique to each individual. Loneliness has no single common cause, so the preventions and treatments for this damaging state of mind through the subtle action and images of the film is a portrayal of many individuals who are leading a discrete life in the midst of an unforgiving society.
